loginpage.title: Login
loginpage.intro: To access our website, register with your email and password. If you have already registered, please login.

location.introduction: Some more information about the city where we are getting married, the location of the wedding and how to visit in Kanpur.
location.cerimonia: The wedding ceremony will take place at Seema Guest House, Block K, Kidwai Nagar, Kanpur.
location.planedescription1: The closest airport is the Chakeri airport. You can catch a cab or local transport from the airport to the venue.
location.planedescription2: The distance from airport to wedding venue is 12km.
location.planedescription3: If you are coming from Lucknow Airport, you can catch a Bus from Airport to Kanpur Ramadevi Crossroad. From there you can catch Auto or Cab to Wedding venue to which distance is 8km.
location.cardescription: Seema Guest House is located near Madhulok Hospital, it’s on main road and easy transportation available.
location.traindescription: Kanpur train station(CNB) can be reached by a lot of long-distance trains, as well as by regional trains. You can check the train schedules. From station you can catch local transport or Cab to wedding venue to which diatance is

contactus.title: Get in touch
contactus.summary: Do you have any questions? Do you want to talk about Pokémon and Dark Souls? Get in touch with us by email
contactus.bridesummary: Born and raised in Kanpur, the beautiful city, with the constant desire to travel and learn about new cultures. I decided to study in RKGIT, Ghaziabad, where I met my other half, over a cup of Tea.
contactus.groomsummary: Born and raised in a little town chida near Sultanpur. I was always fascinated by the Computer Science. I decided to study in RKGIT, Ghaziabad and eventually completed my Mtech from NITK Suratkhal.

gifts.title: Memories
gifts.paragraph: Our wedding day is a celebration of the love and commitment we share, a culmination of the memories we've created together. I feel incredibly blessed to have you by my side, and I promise to cherish and honor every moment of our journey as we build our future together.
